data.title: Daniel Smith
data.meta_description: World Anvil is a worldbuilding tools platform and community for writers, RPG storytellers and worldbuilding lovers
data.text:
Daniel Smith (a.k.a. The Stealthy Lion)

Daniel Smith is known for two things: leading and no shouting. He is adamant that a leader does not need to shout. He simply needs to say a word and his team will listen and obey. And Daniel Smith leads his family in that exact same way with a stern and quiet example.

Physical Description

General Physical Condition

Daniel Smith is a tall, strong man with broad shoulders. He has dirty blonde hair with brown eyes and a little bit of stubble along his jawline. He always seems to be frowning and has a habit of speaking in a condescending tone when someone does not understand him.
